item.title: picoCTF 2018 - Web Exploitation
item.description: first challenges logon explore website logon with any username and password, we are logged on and edit cookies admin=True with developper tools refresh the page and get the flag inspect-me 1 2 3 4 5 6 explore html css javascript files or use recursive wget to download website wget --recursive http://2018shell.picoctf.com:47428 grep -r flag 2018shell.picoctf.com\:47428/ 2018shell.picoctf.com:47428/mycss.css:/* I learned CSS! Here's part 2/3 of the flag: ct0r_g4dget_e96dd105} */ 2018shell.
